```{r, cache=TRUE}

#simple
reccomender_system_simple = function(x){
  if(x[1]> 13){
    cat("you would make a good fighter\n")
  }else{
    cat("not much of a fighter\n")
  }
}


# more complex
reccomender_system_switch = function(x){
  switch(which.max(x),
   cat("a fighter you could be\n"), 
   cat("a wizard you could be\n"), 
   cat("a monk you could be\n"), 
   cat("a thief you could be\n"), 
   cat("a ranger you could be\n"), 
   cat("an illusionist you could be\n"))
  
}

# unsupervised machine learning 
reccomender_system_engine = function(x){

# load a 'dummy' data frame that we know works   
dataset <- read.csv("one.csv", header=FALSE)
colnames(dataset) <-  c("strength", "dexterity", "speed" ,"intelligence","charisma","constitution","Class")
 
  
  for(i in 1:6){
  dataset[i] = x[i]
  }
  
character_model <- readRDS("./character_class_model_lda.rds")
final_predictions <- predict(character_model, dataset) 
cat("the machine thinks you should be a",as.character(final_predictions[1]),"\n")  
}
```
